member.name: M:D4EMBasinsDataExtension.BasinsData.GetBASINSMeterologic(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,D4EMDataManager.Region,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Boolean@,System.Boolean@,System.Boolean,System.Boolean@)
member.summary: Get BASINS Meterologic stations and/or data
member.param: Folder to cache raw downloaded data in
Save met stations in this folder, also save data here if aGetMetData=True but aMetWDM is Nothing or empty string
Save met data in this WDM file
Region to download. If aStationIDs is empty, all stations in bounding box in lat/lon coordinates will be downloaded
True to create a point shapefile containing all stations
True to download met data for each station
True to retrieve new data even if it is already in the cache
True to retrieve new data into the cache but not add to the project

member.param: Folder to cache raw downloaded data in
Save unpacked data in this folder
True to clip downloaded data to aRegion
True to merge data downloaded from different HUC8, False to create separate HUC8 folders
True to retrieve new data even if it is already in the cache
